situation.title: Tourism in the CZ
situation.meta_description: It is now not possible to travel to the Czech Republic for tourism or to visit friends.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations
 

It is now not possible to travel to the Czech Republic for tourism or to visit friends.

It is possible to travel to the Czech Republic only in strictly necessary cases, such as work- or business-related trips (including commuters), trips motivated by family necessities and medical reasons.

Restrictions adopted in the Czech Republic include, among other things, the closure of hotels and accommodation facilities (for touristic purposes), the closure of restaurants, and restrictions on movement in public, which is limited to a maximum of two people together (unless they are members of one household).
